features: Concentrated detergent formula is effective yet gentle on clothes
Contains plant-derived cleaning agents with dirt, stain-fighting enzymes, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients
Biodegradable formula, HE laundry detergent for use in high efficiency and conventional washing machines
Garden-inspired Honeysuckle scented laundry soap with sweet flower and fruit fragrances
Mrs. Meyer's products are made with cruelty-free formulas and are Leaping Bunny certified
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Honeysuckle scented liquid detergent features hardworking yet gentle cleaning agents, while also providing a special, singular scent for your home. Honeysuckle blossoms fill the air with tempting sweet scent - a charming mix of flowers and fruits. So serene and sunny! Effective yet gentle on clothes, our concentrated laundry soap really packs a punch when it comes to removing dirt and grime. Contains surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt and stain-fighting enzymes, essential oils, other thoughtfully chosen ingredients and, of course, are always made with a cruelty-free formula. This biodegradable formula liquid detergent is HE compatible. Concentrated for 64 loads of laundry. Also available in other garden-inspired scents and products such as body lotions, liquid hand soaps, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer's - Rooted in Goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient & Long-Lasting Clean: Mrs. Meyer's Honeysuckle Laundry Detergent Nails It!
reviews.reviewText: Mrs. Meyer's Liquid Laundry Detergent in Honeysuckle is a gem! This pack of 2 bottles is a total game-changer when it comes to laundry. What I love most is its efficiency—it lasts an incredibly long time, thanks to how little you need for a full load.The delightful honeysuckle scent is just the cherry on top. It's not overpowering but leaves clothes smelling fresh and clean, which I adore. Plus, knowing it's infused with essential oils and features a biodegradable formula aligns perfectly with my eco-friendly values.I've been amazed by how effective this detergent is. Even with using a small amount, it tackles stains and leaves fabrics looking and feeling great. It's gentle on clothes but tough on dirt, which is exactly what I need, especially for my family's laundry.The 128 loads per pack is fantastic value for money. It's practical, cost-effective, and delivers exceptional results. Moreover, the bottles are easy to handle and pour from, making laundry days a breeze.If you're looking for a laundry detergent that's both effective and long-lasting, Mrs. Meyer's Honeysuckle formula is a definite winner. It's become a staple in my laundry routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking quality and efficiency in their detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting scent
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite detergent scent from this brand because the scent is noticeable for a long time after washing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We like the Meyer's products and this laundry detergent is very nice. Works well in our HE front load washer, no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this detergent!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because I have been having issues with dry, itchy skin and I figured that a more natural laundry detergent may help, along with changing my usual body wash. I have to say, after using this product I am hooked! You do not need to use much (it's a concentrated detergent) and the scent is wonderful....light, and floral, but not so "girly" that my husband minds it. The detergent also seems to clean our clothing well. I will be ordering it again when we need more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ok so it’s expensive, but there’s nothing else that smells so fresh and Spring-like — I’ve tried. I especially use it for bedding and towels so when they move it releases more honeysuckle scent and I cuddle up to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s like a cult.
reviews.reviewText: I’m constantly chasing the dragon of great smelling laundry!! Detergent & fabric softener sheets were’t enough. Ok so I added the liquid fabric softener. Still not enough. Now I have the scent booster pellets. Still not enough!! Use double, ok…it’s kinda close??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Laundry Product leaves lovely scent
reviews.reviewText: We started using this product after seeing it at my husband's mother's house. She is easily bothered by even trace odors and is very persnickety when it comes to her laundry.We fell in love with it instantly. A very small amount suds up perfectly getting the laundry beautifully clean. It leaves behind a lovely scent that even the pickiest of my sons really like. It is naturally pleasant but not overwhelming or chemical like in any way.We like it so very much regardless of the season and thus have subscribed to this product. Now it comes regularly without any further action or follow up on part.Getting the laundry clean in my home has been simplified and I could not be happier! No regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I only use Ms Myers products because I seem to have allergies to every cleaning product. Since using this brand I have not been at all disappointed and have had a great reduction in skin rashes from other products. Every time someone comes into my home I get a lot of compliments on how clean it smells and the scent is not at all overpowering.
